schema.name: text_to_plate_mesh

color.description: The color of the text RGB, [0~255, 0~255, 0~255]

r.description: The red component of the color

g.description: The green component of the color

b.description: The blue component of the color

insert.description: The insert point of the text (lower left corner)

schema.description: Convert the text to a plate mesh and upload the image as a triangular mesh to MIDAS CIVIL.
